### OBJETIVO 
Let's decrypt this:Â [ciphertext](https://jupiter.challenges.picoctf.org/static/d21037ad23ed84cfff20a84768a0f2b2/ciphertext)? Something seems a bit small.

---
### SOLUCION


``` python
Python 3.11.5 (main, Aug 29 2023, 15:31:31) [GCC 13.2.0] on linux
Type "help", "copyright", "credits" or "license" for more information.
>>> n= 
>>> e = 3
>>> c = 2205316413931134031074603746928247799030155221252519872650073010782049179856976080512716237308882294226369300412719995904064931819531456392957957122459640736424089744772221933500860936331459280832211445548332429338572369823704784625368933
>>> from gmpy2 import *
>>> from Crypto.Util.number import long_to_bytes
>>> gmpy2.get_context().precision = 2048
>>> root , extra = iroot(c,e)
>>> print(root)
13016382529449106065894479374027604750406953699090365388203708028670029596145277
>>> long_to_bytes(root)
b'picoCTF{n33d_a_lArg3r_e_ccaa7776}'
```
